item.title: Being mean to yourself won't make you "better"
item.description: I recently bought a book with a title that, just a month or so earlier, would have sent me running straight for the hills. Said book is the Mindful Self-Compassion Workbook by Dr. Kristen Neff and Dr. Chris Germer, and the whole “Self-Compassion” bit is not something I have historically been open to.
